title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.7 - Miscellaneous regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.7 - Miscellaneous regulations

State Regulations
(a) Each
license shall expire at the end of the calendar year in which issued unless the
same is issued subsequent to September 1st of any calendar year in which event
it shall expire at the end of the succeeding calendar year. (b) Each license shall be accepted in writing
by the licensee before it shall become effective. (c) No license may be assigned or transferred
without the written permission of the Commissioner of General

Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
272.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
